About Us


Welcome to the Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner (ESERC).
We are a community of rail enthusiasts dedicated to share informations, photos, and experiences about trains and railways,
particularly those in the Eastern and South Eastern Suburbun Railway Zones.

Our goal is to bring together all the railfans from all over the region to share their passion and knowledge.
Whether you're interested in the history of the railways, current operations,
or the future of rail transport, ESERC is the place for you.

Join us to celebrate the rich heritage and bright future of railways.
Share your photos, stories, and experiences with fellow railfans.
Contribute to our growing collection of information and help preserve the legacy of our railways.

.
